title: Game crashes and Disconnected
body: I have been disconnected from 3 games in a row, 2 of them being ranked games which makes it worse. I know its not my internet or windows because they are working fine, and thanks to the constant game crashing i have lost a bunch of lp and have let my team mates down and cost them their games, I thought i would have atleast got one of those loss prevented things but instead I get 5 low priority matchmade queues. This is very unfair since your servers or client or whatever it is are the ones that prevented me from doing anything and just really screwed me over. Please fix this Riot

replies.body:
>I know its not my internet or windows because they are working fine,

They could be working fine for everything else you want to do, but not for League, because League does not connect to the internet in the exact same way that your other programs do.

Would you like to troubleshoot this to see what the problem is?
